ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: Well look me up sometime. I play Erollisi Marr and if I m in the Guk or Queynos area I ll try to go kill some frogs and GIVE you a pair of gloves.  I have
ygData.messageBody:
Well look me up sometime. I play Erollisi Marr and if I'm in the Guk or
Queynos area I'll try to go kill some frogs and GIVE you a pair of gloves. I
have never sold any netted or woven armor to fellow monks, but I have GIVEN
it to them. No I don't hunt for it or stock it, but if I happen to have
some on me or I'm in an area where I can kill for it I'll try to help out.

Synjyn DragonFist
21st Circle
Erollisi Marr
